subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Purdue’s new football coach is Darrell Hazell, who was this season’s Mid-American Conference coach of the year after leading Kent State to its first winning season since 2001.
snippet: Purdue’s new football coach is Darrell Hazell, who was this season’s Mid-American Conference coach of the year after leading Kent State to its first winning season since 2001.
